description: Monitoring of internal JMX metrics from the OpenNMS Core system collected via JMX exporter for Prometheus.

panels.description: Pollerd completion ratio in percent. Should be 100.
panels.title: Completion Ratio

panels.description: Pollerd thread usage statistics
panels.title: Thread Pool

panels.description: Pollerd scheduler task statistics
panels.title: Scheduler

panels.description: Polling tasks in pending queue. Should be 0.
panels.title: Pending

panels.description: Polls per second over a 1 minute time window.
panels.title: Polling Rate

panels.description: Collectd completion ratio in percent. Should be 100.
panels.title: Completion Ratio

panels.description: Collectd thread usage statistics
panels.title: Thread Pool

panels.description: Collectd scheduler task statistics
panels.title: Scheduler

panels.description: Collection tasks in pending queue. Should be 0.
panels.title: Pending

panels.description: Number of services we collect metrics from.
panels.title: Collectible Services

panels.description: Provisiond import thread usage statistics
panels.title: Import Thread Pool

panels.description: Provisiond writer thread usage statistics
panels.title: Writer Thread Pool

panels.description: Provisiond scan thread usage statistics
panels.title: Scan Thread Pool

panels.description: Provisiond scheduler thread usage statistics
panels.title: Scheduler Thread Pool

panels.description: Provisiond import scheduler usage statistics
panels.title: Import Scheduler

panels.description: Provisiond writer scheduler usage statistics
panels.title: Writer Scheduler

panels.description: Provisiond scan scheduler usage statistics
panels.title: Scan Scheduler

panels.description: Provisiond scheduler usage statistics
panels.title: Scheduler

panels.description: Statistics about received SNMP Traps and their versions processed by the OpenNMS Core system.
panels.title: SNMP Trap Reception

panels.description: Statistics about SNMP trap reception failures.
panels.title: SNMP Trap Failures

panels.description: Statistics about IPC consumer dispatch time for SNMP Traps internally
panels.title: SNMP Trap IPC Consumer Dispatch

panels.description: Statistics about IPC producer dispatch time for SNMP Traps internally
panels.title: SNMP Trap IPC Producer Dispatch

panels.description: Statistics about reception of NetFlow v5 messages on Telemetryd adapter.
panels.title: NetFlow v5 Reception Statistics

panels.description: Statistics about reception of NetFlow v9 messages on Telemetryd adapter.
panels.title: NetFlow v9 Reception Statistics

panels.description: Statistics about reception of IPFIX (NetFlow v10) messages on Telemetryd adapter.
panels.title: IPFIX Reception Statistics

panels.description: Statistics about reception of sFlow messages on Telemetryd adapter.
panels.title: sFlow Reception Statistics

panels.description: Statistics about reception of BMP messages on Telemetryd adapter.
panels.title: BMP Reception Statistics

title: Prometheus: OpenNMS Core Internals
